h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: One if its big main attacks can look scary at first until you understand the movement, and will start when it stands up but begins to crouch its body. The Centipede will roll into a ball and charge at you with alarming speed, and even bounce off walls to come back to hit you a second time.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
One if its big main attacks can look scary at first until you understand the movement, and will start when it stands up but begins to crouch its body. The Centipede will roll into a ball and charge at you with alarming speed, and even bounce off walls to come back to hit you a second time.
